set.seed(12345)

custom_hist = function(x, y, xlab = "", ylab = "", main = "", col = 2)
{
  h = hist(1:(2 * length(x)), breaks = length(x), plot = FALSE)
  
  h$breaks = 2 * (0:length(x))
  h$mids = 2 * (0:(length(x) - 1)) + 1
  h$density = y
  h$counts = y
  plot(h, main = main, xlab = xlab, ylab = ylab, col = col, axes = F)
}

n_bins = 19

nrow = 10
